name: Infamy on the High Seas
description:
Trade and battle your way to pirate infamy!

You can repair at the first port by trading for the hammer item, hovering over it will show "repair full hp". Left click on your own cargo to sell for infamy, right on your own cargo to refresh the port's stock.

Board game inspired single player roguelite where you trade items and battle enemy ships on your way to become the infamous Pirate King!

Made for the BW Game Jam #8

Please play full screen :D

Credits

Programming - Phillip Swanepoel 

Art - Josua De Vries

Game Design - Rowan Budhai

Music - Wynand Fourie

Additional Art - Marle Van Baalen
